items.headline: My mother has dementia. If I force her into memory care without a conservatorship, would that be considered kidnapping?
items.summary_en: “She has never been willing to sign a power of attorney.”

items.headline: AMD gets upgrade after 24% surge. ‘We rarely do this,’ says chagrinned analyst
items.summary_en: It’s likely the first of many — analysts at Jefferies upgraded Advanced Micro Devices to a buy, after the chipmaker’s stock surged on a pact with ChatGPT maker OpenAI.

items.headline: NBA’s Michael Porter Jr. lists Denver high-rise home for $5.25 million
items.summary_en: NBA star Michael Porter Jr. is getting set to sever his ties to Denver by listing his opulent apartment for $5.25 million—3 months after he was traded to the Brooklyn Nets.

items.headline: The U.S. just took a stake in another resources company — and the stock is tripling
items.summary_en: Trilogy Metals shares tripled in premarket trade on Tuesday as the U.S. government took a 10% stake in a company exploring in Alaska for copper and other metals.

items.headline: Rapper A$AP Rocky sold his $4 million L.A. mansion in off-market deal months before Rihanna gave birth
items.summary_en: Days before A$AP Rocky’s longtime partner Rihanna debuted her baby bump on the red carpet in May, the rapper quietly sold his L.A. home.

items.headline: Here’s how much shorter your life is if you’re poor in America
items.summary_en: Older adults with the fewest financial resources die much earlier than those with more wealth.

items.headline: AppLovin has been one of the year’s hottest stocks. Here’s why it’s tumbling today.
